document.full_text: tunisian authorities have prepared 18 legal cases against former president zine al-abidine ben ali, including "voluntary manslaughter" and "drug trafficking," the state tap news agency said on wednesday. the revelation was made by justice minister lazhar karoui chebbi in an interview aired on state television, tap said.
document.title: tunisia has legal cases against ben ali: minister
lines_and_colors: tunisian authorities have prepared 18 legal cases against former president zine al-abidine ben ali, including "voluntary manslaughter" and "drug trafficking," the state tap news agency said on wednesday. the revelation was made by justice minister lazhar karoui chebbi in an interview aired on state television, tap said.
